AD_OutsideSignPost.synopsis: This signpost is located just outside of the last ligh inn.
AD_OutsideSignPost.how_to_trigger: Click on the signpost just outside the last light inn, on the checkpoint side.

AD_OutsideSignPost_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_OutsideSignPost_0.text: *For a warm bed and full stomach, look no further. Welcome to the Last Light Inn.*
AD_OutsideSignPost_0.context: NodeContext: a sign for an inn
